Class ExceptionalException

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Throwable
java.lang.Exception
java.lang.RuntimeException
net.dapete.exceptional.ExceptionalException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ExceptionalException extends RuntimeException
Exception that wraps exceptions returned by the functional interfaces in the net.dapete.exceptional.function package.

Used by ExceptionalWrapper.

See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Method Details

    • getCause

      public Exception getCause()
      Override the default Throwable.getCause() to return an Exception, not just a Throwable. The cause of an ExceptionalException is guaranteed to be an Exception.
      Overrides:
      getCause in class Throwable
      Returns:
      the cause of this exception.

    • throwCause

      public void throwCause() throws Exception
      Rethrows the cause of this exception.
      Throws:
      Exception - the cause of this exception.

    • unwrap

      public static void unwrap(@NonNull Runnable runnable) throws Exception
      Unwraps any ExceptionalException thrown when executing runnable.run() and throws its cause instead.
      Parameters:
      runnable - a runnable that may throw an ExceptionalException.
      Throws:
      Exception - the cause of the ExceptionalException, if runnable throws one.

    • unwrap

      public static <E extends Exception> void unwrap(@NonNull Class<E> exceptionClass, @NonNull Runnable runnable) throws E
      Unwraps any ExceptionalException thrown when executing runnable.run() and throws its cause instead, if it is an instance of exceptionClass.
      Type Parameters:
      E - the type of the cause of the ExceptionalException
      Parameters:
      exceptionClass - the class of the cause of the ExceptionalException
      runnable - a runnable that may throw an ExceptionalException.
      Throws:
      E - the cause of the ExceptionalException, if runnable throws one and its cause is an instance of exceptionClass.

    • unwrap

      public static <E1 extends Exception, E2 extends Exception> void unwrap(@NonNull Class<E1> exceptionClass1, @NonNull Class<E2> exceptionClass2, @NonNull Runnable runnable) throws E1, E2
      Unwraps any ExceptionalException thrown when executing runnable.run() and throws its cause instead, if it is an instance of exceptionClass1 or exceptionClass2.
      Type Parameters:
      E1 - the type of the first possible cause of the ExceptionalException
      E2 - the type of the second possible cause of the ExceptionalException
      Parameters:
      exceptionClass1 - the class of the first possible cause of the ExceptionalException
      exceptionClass2 - the class of the second possible cause of the ExceptionalException
      runnable - a runnable that may throw an ExceptionalException.
      Throws:
      E1 - the cause of the ExceptionalException, if runnable throws one and its cause is an instance of exceptionClass1.
      E2 - the cause of the ExceptionalException, if runnable throws one and its cause is an instance of exceptionClass2.

    • unwrap

      public static <E1 extends Exception, E2 extends Exception, E3 extends Exception> void unwrap(@NonNull Class<E1> exceptionClass1, @NonNull Class<E2> exceptionClass2, @NonNull Class<E3> exceptionClass3, @NonNull Runnable runnable) throws E1, E2, E3
      Unwraps any ExceptionalException thrown when executing runnable.run() and throws its cause instead, if it is an instance of exceptionClass1, exceptionClass2 or exceptionClass3.
      Type Parameters:
      E1 - the type of the first possible cause of the ExceptionalException
      E2 - the type of the second possible cause of the ExceptionalException
      E3 - the type of the third possible cause of the ExceptionalException
      Parameters:
      exceptionClass1 - the class of the first possible cause of the ExceptionalException
      exceptionClass2 - the class of the second possible cause of the ExceptionalException
      exceptionClass3 - the class of the third possible cause of the ExceptionalException
      runnable - a runnable that may throw an ExceptionalException.
      Throws:
      E1 - the cause of the ExceptionalException, if runnable throws one and its cause is an instance of exceptionClass1.
      E2 - the cause of the ExceptionalException, if runnable throws one and its cause is an instance of exceptionClass2.
      E3 - the cause of the ExceptionalException, if runnable throws one and its cause is an instance of exceptionClass3.

    • unwrap

      public static <T> T unwrap(@NonNull Supplier<T> supplier) throws Exception
      Unwraps any ExceptionalException thrown when executing supplier.get() and throws its cause instead.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the return type of supplier.
      Parameters:
      supplier - a supplier that may throw an ExceptionalException.
      Throws:
      Exception - the cause of the ExceptionalExceptionExceptionalException, if runnable throws one.

    • unwrap

      public static <T, E extends Exception> T unwrap(@NonNull Class<E> exceptionClass, @NonNull Supplier<T> supplier) throws E
      Unwraps any ExceptionalException thrown when executing supplier.get() and throws its cause instead, if it is an instance of exceptionClass.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the return type of supplier.
      E - the type of the cause of the ExceptionalException
      Parameters:
      exceptionClass - the class of the cause of the ExceptionalException
      supplier - a supplier that may throw an ExceptionalException.
      Throws:
      E - the cause of the ExceptionalException, if supplier throws one and its cause is an instance of exceptionClass.

    • unwrap

      public static <T, E1 extends Exception, E2 extends Exception> T unwrap(@NonNull Class<E1> exceptionClass1, @NonNull Class<E2> exceptionClass2, @NonNull Supplier<T> supplier) throws E1, E2
      Unwraps any ExceptionalException thrown when executing supplier.get() and throws its cause instead, if it is an instance of exceptionClass1 or exceptionClass2.
      Type Parameters:
      E1 - the type of the first possible cause of the ExceptionalException
      E2 - the type of the second possible cause of the ExceptionalException
      Parameters:
      exceptionClass1 - the class of the first possible cause of the ExceptionalException
      exceptionClass2 - the class of the second possible cause of the ExceptionalException
      supplier - a supplier that may throw an ExceptionalException.
      Throws:
      E1 - the cause of the ExceptionalException, if supplier throws one and its cause is an instance of exceptionClass1.
      E2 - the cause of the ExceptionalException, if supplier throws one and its cause is an instance of exceptionClass2.

    • unwrap

      public static <T, E1 extends Exception, E2 extends Exception, E3 extends Exception> T unwrap(@NonNull Class<E1> exceptionClass1, @NonNull Class<E2> exceptionClass2, @NonNull Class<E3> exceptionClass3, @NonNull Supplier<T> supplier) throws E1, E2, E3
      Unwraps any ExceptionalException thrown when executing supplier.get() and throws its cause instead, if it is an instance of exceptionClass1, exceptionClass2 or exceptionClass3.
      Type Parameters:
      E1 - the type of the first possible cause of the ExceptionalException
      E2 - the type of the second possible cause of the ExceptionalException
      E3 - the type of the third possible cause of the ExceptionalException
      Parameters:
      exceptionClass1 - the class of the first possible cause of the ExceptionalException
      exceptionClass2 - the class of the second possible cause of the ExceptionalException
      exceptionClass3 - the class of the third possible cause of the ExceptionalException
      supplier - a supplier that may throw an ExceptionalException.
      Throws:
      E1 - the cause of the ExceptionalException, if supplier throws one and its cause is an instance of exceptionClass1.
      E2 - the cause of the ExceptionalException, if supplier throws one and its cause is an instance of exceptionClass2.
      E3 - the cause of the ExceptionalException, if supplier throws one and its cause is an instance of exceptionClass3.
